this  point 
in  detail, 
I  must  point  out  that  this  submission

column1: overlooks the basic distinction between a choice of law clause and  a choice of place
of jurisdiction. A choice of law clause is a clause by which the parties agree as to the

column2: law that will govern the relationship between the parties. A law so chosen  is  known
the  governing  law  or  the  proper  law  of  the  contract.  A  choice  of  place  of
